question.value: The prefrontal cortex is the part of the brain that plays a crucial role in executive control.

chinese.value: 前额叶皮质是大脑中在执行控制方面发挥关键作用的部分。

germany.value: Der präfrontale Cortex ist der Teil des Gehirns, der eine entscheidende Rolle bei der Exekutivkontrolle spielt.

japanese.value: 前頭前野皮質は、実行制御に重要な役割を果たす脳の部分です。

germanyAcademicVocabulary.value: [{"word":"Exekutivkontrolle","phonetic":"ˌɛgzɛkuˈtiːfkoˈntroːlə","definition":"die Fähigkeit zu planen, Entscheidungen zu treffen und Maßnahmen entsprechend langfristiger Ziele und Prioritäten zu ergreifen"}]

japaneseAcademicVocabulary.value: [{"word":"実行制御","phonetic":"じっこうせいぎょ","definition":"長期的な目標や優先事項に従って計画し、行動を取る能力"}]

academicVocabulary.value: [{"word":"prefrontal cortex","phonetic":"ˌpriːˌfrʌntəl ˈkɔːteks","definition":"frontal lobe areas that are anterior to the primary motor area and involved in higher mental functions"},{"word":"executive control","phonetic":"ɪɡˈzekjʊtɪv kənˈtrəʊl","definition":"the ability to plan, make decisions, and take actions according to long-term goals and priorities."},{"word":"crucial","phonetic":"ˈkruːʃəl","definition":"decisive or critical, especially in the success or failure of something"}]
